txt.en: 'Your resolve has helped us to turn the tide, [placeholder]! When you first arrived, we were besieged by foes on all sides, but now... now we are the ones driving back our enemies! I daresay that our victory in reclaiming Durin's Way is all but assured, and you played no small part in that.\n\n'There are other dwarves in Khazad-d청m that are in greater need than we are. Simbi in the Twenty-first hall has asked that we send you to him. Good luck to you my friend. We will not forget your bravery.'
'[placeholder]! You are not a moment too late, I have been awaiting your arrival.\n\n'Oxi says that things are going well in Durin's Way, but the same cannot be said for all of Khazad-d청m.'

Oxi believes that your efforts have greatly improved matters in Durin's Way, since your arrival. He believes that victory is assured for the dwarves at Jaz창rgund, but that other locations  in Moria may need your assistance.
Speak to Simbi in the Twenty-first Hall
Simbi is on duty in the Twenty-first Hall, south of Jaz창rgund. \n\nSimbi has sent a message to Oxi, asking to speak with you in the Twenty-first Hall.
